system.description:
When you choose this archetype at 1st-level, your archetype spells are selected from one of several lists, chosen from below. Your choice of archetype spell list affects other features from this archetype.

Table: Plant Priest Spells

1 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.r9za0lmnarmx99nm]{Goodberry}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.cvrja4dkrr0zoerp]{Entangle}
3 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.yhdfb6yywes7eswj]{Barkskin}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.bt04eqvuxnv602cp]{Spike Growth}
5 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.fnuefdnb228qwwu8]{Plant Growth}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.rek0fg987gg30wp9]{Speak with Plants}
7 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.2q65v0xklhfx73to]{Blight}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.1k3940gaxkcoqofp]{Hallucinatory Terrain}
9 @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pdwrag8eq7r0ldcp]{Commune with Nature}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.8j1p6dsp3qfvjprc]{Tree Stride}
